t = int(input())
while t:
    t -= 1
    n = int(input())
    g = [[] for _ in range(n)]
    for _ in range(n - 1):
        (u, v, w) = map(int, input().split())
        u -= 1
        v -= 1
        g[u].append((v, w))
        g[v].append((u, w))
    z = []
    seen = [0] * n
    seen[0] = 1
    stack = [(0, 0)]
    while stack:
        (u, xor) = stack.pop()
        z += (xor,)
        for (v, w) in g[u]:
            if not seen[v]:
                seen[v] = 1
                stack.append((v, xor ^ w))
    ans = 0
    for i in range(31, -1, -1):
        ans = ans * 2 + 1
        c = {j >> i for j in z}
        if not any((j ^ ans in c for j in c)):
            ans -= 1
    print(ans)
